mapper.sql: id, name, range, area_code, create_date, update_date
mapper.select:
select
from tbl_store_info
1=1
and name LIKE '%${name}%'
and range LIKE '%${range}%'
and area_code =#{area_code,jdbcType=INTEGER}
ORDER BY create_date DESC limit #{page_start},#{page_end}

select
from tbl_store_info
1=1
and name LIKE '%${name}%'
and range LIKE '%${range}%'
and area_code =#{area_code,jdbcType=INTEGER}
ORDER BY create_date DESC
mapper.insert:
insert into tbl_store_info
name,
range,
area_code,
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{range,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{areaCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update tbl_store_info
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
range = #{range,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area_code = #{areaCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_date = now(),
WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tbl_store_info set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, range = #{record.range,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_code = #{record.areaCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{record.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{record.updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update tbl_store_info
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
range = #{range,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area_code = #{areaCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tbl_store_info set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, range = #{range,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_code = #{areaCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
